description: Demolition of existing rear outbuilding. Erection of a single storey rear extension. First floor front extension over existing garage. Hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with 2no juliet balconies, installation of 3no rooflights to front roof slope and 2no windows to side gable to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed gable roof forms would result in the loss of symmetry between the pair of semi-detached dwellings at numbers 139 and 141 Hook Rise South, Chessington KT6 7NA. The proposed first floor front infill extension would result in a form of development that would fail to appear subservient to the host dwelling. The proposed rear dormer would be excessive in size. The proposal would therefore have a harmful impact on the character and appearance of the host dwelling and the surrounding area, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2019), Policies CS8 and DM 10 of the Council's adopted Core Strategy (2012) and paragraph 4.29  and Policy Guidance 36 and 39  of the Council's Residential Design Supplementary Planning Document (2013).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Conditions 3 (Cleaning and Maintenance Schedule), 6 (Waste and Recycling Facilities) and 7 (Delivery and Service Plan) of planning permission 21/02494/PRA are hereby discharged subject to the carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

This pre-application falls under Category DThe fee required for your pre-planning application is £ 1,775.00.  We received £250.00, please pay the outstanding fee £1,525.00. Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.
